message: Starting test planning - analyzing spawn_child_agent bug at line 2336 in real_mcp_server.py
Bug analysis complete. Confirmed: spawn_child_agent:2336 calls deploy_headless_agent without .fn - must use deploy_headless_agent.fn() instead. Now designing comprehensive test strategy.
Comprehensive test plan created with 5 test scenarios covering direct calls, end-to-end spawning, multi-level hierarchy, limits, and regression. Document saved to test_plan_spawn_child_agent.md

Test planning COMPLETE. Created comprehensive 541-line test plan with 5 executable test scenarios (direct call, end-to-end, hierarchy, limits, regression). Each test includes Python code, expected outputs, failure indicators, and stop conditions.
